txt.en: Quickbeam sent you to explore Gemyndsted and prevent invaders from ruining or looting of its long-lost secrets.
'[placeholder], you return with great news! Saruman's influence wanes further.'
The Horse stands nearby waiting patiently to take you to Gemyndsted.\n\nYou should ride the Horse to Gemyndsted.

'There are some places where Isengard still stands that we cannot reach. Gemyndsted, a small library of ancient Men, is one of these places. The White Hand must be destroyed everywhere. Saruman's influence there must be ended.\n\n'Speak to me again and I will show you where this ruin lies.'
Having defeated the leader of the invaders in Gemyndsted, you prepare to return to Quickbeam and inform him of your success.\n\nQuickbeam is at Derndingle.
You gather your belongings and prepare to journey to Gemyndsted.
Defeated the leader of the invaders in Gemyndsted
'Have you defeated whatever vile thing is leading the invaders within Gemyndsted?'
You gather your belongings and prepare to journey to Gemyndsted. Egbalth nods and waves you on as you approach the Horse.
Defeat the leader of the invaders in Gemyndsted
Speak with Quickbeam to travel to Gemyndsted.
